company.name: PT Agromedia Pustaka
company.address: Jl. H. Montong No 57, RT.09 RW. 03, Ciganjur - Jagakarsa - Jakarta Selatan
company.description:
Kelompok Agromedia adalah sebuah perusahaan penerbitan yang lahir tepat 1 April 2001. Saat ini Kelompok Agromedia memiliki lebih dari 20 penerbit antara lain:
Kawan Pustaka, Wahyu Media, Qultum Media, Gradien Mediatama, Gagasmedia, Lintas Kata Sarana, Media Kita dan Visimedia. Beberapa penerbit juga memiliki imprint, diantaranya Bukune, Enter Media, Panda Media, Bintang Wahyu, Wahyu Qolbu, Moka Media, C-Media, Ruang Kata, Lingua Kata, Kawan Kita, Anak Kita, Transmedia, Demedia, Indonesia Tera, Agromedia Pustaka, Cikal Aksara, F-Media, Tangga Pustaka, Booku, dan B-Media. Dengan banyaknya penerbit yang tergabung, Kelompok Agromedia secara konsisten menerbitkan buku dengan beragam tema.
Selain bergerak di bidang penerbitan, Kelompok Agromedia juga memiliki jaringan distributor buku di antaranya: Buku Kita, Kawah Media, Transmedia Distributor, Agromedia Distributor, Suka Buku, Buku Seru dan Buka Buku Pustaka.
Kelompok Agromedia juga bergerak dalam bidang percetakan (Sarana Kata Grafika), Properti (Agung Persada Propertindo), Distributor E-Book (Republik Media Kreatif), dll.

company.name: PT Techno Triireka
company.address: Jl. Duta Boulevard L10, Duta Harapan, Harapan Baru, Bekasi Utara Kota Bekasi, Jawa Barat – Indonesia 17123
company.description:
PT.TECHNO TRIIREKA has established in 2003, we have developed an engineering business as our principal business activities of the company. At February 2008 CV Mitra Techno was change become PT Techno Triireka. PT Techno Triireka has developed trading business (Sales Division) and engineering business (Engineering Division) as our principal business activities of the company. The sales division is focusing on providing the industrial machines and the tools used at the factory site of the automotive industry. The engineering division is focusing on machining, fabrication, design for a special machineries on automotive company.

In any course of business, we examine all customers request throughly and respond straight forward to accomplish the Corporate Philosophy triad, "Customer Satisfaction", "Quality Improvement” and "Originality and Ingenuity". Likewise, we consider it is important to propose our customers one step further such as eco-friendly products. We will continue to be the company that provides reliability and satisfaction to all customers. It is our mission to become ”Your Trully Global Partner" by responding to various needs of customer.

company.name: PT Home Decor
company.address: Jl. RS Fatmawati No. 5A,C,D, RT.001 RW.006 Kel. Gandaria Utara, Kec. Kebayoran Baru, Jakarta Selatan 12140
company.description:
Since Home Decor was first launched in 1992, we have established a solid reputation for delivering design and quality of the highest standard. We are renowned for our expert artistry, detailed hand finish, and personalized service.

Initially a retail company, Home Decor has expanded to serve a variety of wholesale and commercial clients, and our work has been given pride of place in multiple settings including hotels, embassies, politicians’ residences, celebrities’ homes, and royal palaces.

Our wholesale division sells fabrics to all major stores across the archipelago. In addition, our affiliated Singapore-based office, Fabs International, sells fabrics to commercial enterprises and retail shops across Singapore and Malaysia.

company.name: PT Maxon Prime Technology
company.address: Jl Cor DKI RT/RW 003/002 Ds. Ciangir Kec.Legok Kabupaten Tangerang
company.description:
Maxon pump is a company headquartered in Indonesia with an extensively growing 

presence in the ASEAN region. 

Maxon has over 25 years of manufacturing experience accumulated through its R&D 

team located in Turin, Italy led by our acclaimed engineer, Dr. Eng La Porta Paolo. 

Although we could say Maxon is a relatively young company, our unprecedented 

growth has allowed us to realistically aim in bringing Maxon past the ASEAN market and 

into the global market through our manufacturing partners located in Italy, India, 

Indones'a, China and Taiwan. 

In short, despite being a young company, Maxon currently produces over 200 

types of quality pumps utilising Italian technology and have continuously expanded our 

selection of products to suit various needs. We currently have offices and partners 

throughout Southeast Asia, China, Australia and Italy. In Indonesia, our sales office can be 

found in the heart of Jakarta within the prominent Sudirman Central Busines district. 

Our most recent addition is our state-of-the-art manufacturing facil'ty ocated 

further west in the developing industrial area in Tangerang, which has recently been 

appointed as our headquarters. 

With experienced engineers hailing from Italy and China, Maxon is constantly 

working around the clock to innovate new designs for our pumps that will deliver 

unmatched performance. After all, the satisfaction of our clients is our greatest 

motivator; hence, we will always strive to improve ourselves with prompt response, 

on-time deliveries, reasonable prices, and ensuring our pumps are always up to 

Maxons high standards. 

Our companys pursuit of excellence 'n the manufacturing and machining process 

of achieving our maxim, "quality, responsibility, and efficiency" extends to our company's 

belief in promoting corporate social responsibility. 

With recent turmoil in the community due to COVID.19, Maxon has become 

involved in philanthropic missions to Care for its community by providing essential 

goods such as hygiene and food products to tho se in need.

company.name: Yayasan Suprasaka Dharma Wirasta
company.address: Jl. Kyai Haji Zainul Arifin No.11, RT.5/RW.1, Petojo Utara, Kecamatan Gambir, Kota Jakarta Pusat, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta 10130
company.description:
Seiring dengan pesatnya pertumbuhan penduduk dan teknologi dimana nilai-nilai agama dan budaya mulai terpinggirkan sehingga tempat ibadah semakin dibutuhkan. Salah satunya adalah Vihara yang berlokasi di Jakarta, dimana lahan di tengah kota yang kian hari kian terbatas.

Berangkat dari dasar pemikiran ini maka Yayasan Suprasaka Dharma Wirasta yang berdiri pada tahun 2000 memutuskan untuk membangun Vihara “Maha Dharma 廣法寺” dengan maksud untuk memberikan tempat bagi kalangan umat Buddha untuk menjalankan ibadah dan sembahyang bagi para leluhurnya.

Vihara “Maha Dharma 廣法寺” dengan konsep arsitektur China modern berlokasi di Jl. K.H. Zainul Arifin No. 11, Kelurahan Petojo Utara, Kecamatan Gambir, Jakarta Pusat berdiri diatas lahan seluas 1.515 m2 terdiri dari 4 lantai dan 2 basement, dimana sampai pada saat ini masih dalam tahap pembangunan. Vihara “Maha Dharma 廣法寺” memberikan kesempatan bagi seluruh lapisan masyarakat yang ingin berpartisipasi dalam pembangunannya.

Akhir kata apabila dalam tulisan-tulisan ini terdapat hal-hal yang kurang berkenan kami mohon maaf yang sebesar-besarnya.

company.name: PT Elabram Systems
company.address: Pusat Bisnis Thamrin City, Lt. 7 Units OS O1 A,B and OS O2 A,B,C, JI. Thamrin Boulevard (Kebon Kacang Raya), Jakarta Pusat
company.description:
In 1999 Elabram Systems Group was incorporated, aimed to become No. 1 manpower outsourcing and recruitment company in Asia Pacific for Information Communications and Technology industry. Focusing on Manpower Solution Outsourcing (MSO), Network Planning Optimization (NPO), Workforce Management System (WMS), Workforce Mobile Devices (WMD), E-Pro – Project Field Tracking, and E-Pro – Project Field Tracking – the team consist of experts of finding the right candidate.
​
company.billing_address: Pusat Bisnis Thamrin City, Lt. 7 Units OS O1 A,B and OS O2 A,B,C, JI. Thamrin Boulevard (Kebon Kacang Raya), Jakarta Pusat
company.vision_mission:
**Vision**

To exceed expectations in Network Planning and Optimization (NPO) in the Telecommunication IT industry, Manpower Solutions Outsourcing (MSO), Workforce Management Systems (WMS), Software Solutions, Workforce Mobile Device (WMD) and E-Pro-Project Field Tracking in the Asia Pacific region.
​
Elabram aims to be the system integrator for IoT, AI, Blockchain and Big Data where it can help companies to reduce OPEX, increase efficiencies and a better managed systems

**Mission**

Our in-depth understanding of our customer’s requirements allows us to deliver quality solutions, and maintain long term relationships. Elabram believes in integrity and effective management. With an empowered, dynamic and innovative work force we create a strong backbone for your organization; dedicated to excellence in service and a commitment to standards of high quality.

company.name: PT Recruit First Indonesia
company.address: District 8, Prosperity Tower, 10th floor Unit G, SCBD Lot 28, Jl. Jend. Sudirman, RT.5/RW.3, Senayan, Kebayoran Baru, Jakarta Selatan
company.description:
RimbunJob Agency is a higly effective executive search company Indonesia dedicated to serving specialized recruitment of well-known, respected clients seeking top talent in a variety of industries and levels.

Established in 2007, As a Recruitment company Indonesia, RimbunJob Agency is equipped with an integrated IT System, experienced recruitment consultants, and proven searching method.

We maintain an extensive database of candidates and we invest heavily in this database to ensure that our client have access to the best candidates in the marketplace.

Furthermore, Our recruitment consultants have a team of dedicated researchers to network across the marketplace in order to identify the best candidates.

With a good track record of manager to upper executive level placements throughout Indonesia, we pride ourselves as the only Headhunter in Indonesia that is supported with an Integrated advanced IT system.
company.billing_address: District 8, Prosperity Tower, 10th floor Unit G, SCBD Lot 28, Jl. Jend. Sudirman, RT.5/RW.3, Senayan, Kebayoran Baru, Jakarta Selatan
